list.abs: Oligosaccharides are polymers of two to ten monosaccharide units ., 寡糖是两个到十个单糖单元的聚合物.
when a polysaccharide is composed of two or more different monosaccharide units , it is a heteroglycan .当一个多糖由两个或更多不同单糖单元组成时称杂聚糖。
